          <title>
            <string language="en">The methane fireball</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die MethanFeuerkugel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'aérolithe de méthane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O fireball do methane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il fireball del metano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η βολίδα μεθανίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La bola de fuego del metano</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of a series of five illustrations showing a drawn-out glass tube attached to a Bunsen tubing.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">burning</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reactions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fireball</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fuels</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">methane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">safety screen</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von einer Reihe von fünf Abbildungen, die 
ein gezeichnetes-heraus Glasgefäß angebracht zu einem Bunsen 
Schläuche zeigen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord d'une série de cinq illustrations montrant
un tube de verre dessiné-dehors fixé à une tuyauterie de Bunsen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de uma série de cinco ilustrações 
que mostram um tubo de vidro desenhado-para fora unido a uma 
tubulação de Bunsen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di una serie di cinque illustrazioni
che mostrano un tubo di vetro dissipato -fuori fissato ad una 
tubazione di Bunsen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα μιας σειράς πέντε απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν 
ένας σύρω-έξω σωλήνας γυαλιού συνδέθηκε με μια σωλήνωση 
Bunsen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de una serie de cinco ilustraciones que 
muestran un tubo de cristal trazado -hacia fuera asociado a un 
aislante de tubo de Bunsen.</string>
          </description>
